movies.title: Mang nu 72 xiao shi
movies.plot: Mrs. Ng, who is left temporarily blind after an operation. Second day, her husband takes off to Macau for a few days. Soon afterwards, Sam, a former patient shows up, with sinister motives.
movies.simplePlot: Mrs. Ng, who is left temporarily blind after an operation. Second day, her husband takes off to Macau for a few days. Soon afterwards, Sam, a former patient shows up, with sinister motives.

biography.birthName: Anthony Perry (English name) Chau-Sang Wong (Chinese Name)
biography.bio: Anthony Wong Chau-Sang was born to a British father and a Chinese mother. He never knew his father, since the man left his family when Wong was four years old. He trained acting at ATV and later enrolled into the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts. After working in several TV Series, he shot to stardom with hits such as "Hard-Boiled" and his Golden Horse-winning performance in the horrific "The Untold Story." He later appeared in the "Young and Dangerous" films as Dai Fei, a friend to Ekin Cheng's Ho Nam. In 1995, he made his directorial debut with New Tenant. He won his second Hong Kong Film Award for his role as the corrupt police officer Tung in the critically acclaimed "Beast Cops" (1998). Wong continued his success in supporting roles in films such as "Infernal Affairs" (2002) and "Initial D" (2005).
biography.name: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong

biography.bio: After finishing 2nd runner-up in the Miss Asia beauty pageant, Veronica Yip became a popular singer in Hong Kong, and then followed the career path of many Cantopop singers by going into movies. Although more acclaimed as a vocalist than an actress, Yip gave several fine performances in successful films, such as her role as the frigid and neglected wife in Hong meigui, bai meigui (1994). While appearing in concert in Atlantic City in December, 1995, she was introduced to a New York supermarket magnate. They were married the following autumn, whereupon she retired to raise a family.
biography.name: Veronica Yip

biography.bio: Anthony Chan was born on October 1, 1952 in Hong Kong as Chi-To Chan. He is an actor and producer, known for Mr. Vampire (1985), Mister Dynamite (1986) and My Americanized Wife (1992).
biography.name: Anthony Chan

biography.bio: Alfred Cheung was born on January 1, 1955. He is an actor and writer, known for Le médaillon (2003), Biao jie, ni hao ye! (1990) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! xu ji (1991).
biography.name: Alfred Cheung

biography.bio: Fruit Chan was born on April 15, 1959 in Guangdong, China. He is an actor and director, known for 3 extrêmes (2004), Made in Hong Kong (1997) and The Midnight After (2014).
biography.name: Fruit Chan

biography.bio: Jamie Luk is an actor and director, known for Rumble in the Bronx (1995), Endless Love (1993) and Driving Miss Wealthy (2004).
biography.name: Jamie Luk
